itunes:title: To Grass or Not to Grass (A Gardening Episode)
title: To Grass or Not to Grass (A Gardening Episode)
description:
Tired of fighting tooth and nail for a lovely garden? Or are you simply a beautiful house plant kind of girl?  Gardener or not, we've got a rich conversation for you today as we decide, grass or no grass?

For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchicsparkling

Dry Farm Wines is a wine supplier that sources organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. Dry Farm Wines finds boutique, family-owned, small-scale wineries and brings their wine to the US for our tasting pleasure. This is supporting regenerative agriculture at its finest and it tastes delicious. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural and traditionally made wines. Better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. You must try Dry Farm Wines MUCH better wines. You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS
Join Angela's OLD WORLD DESIGN SOCIETY / oldworld.parisiennefarmgirl.com A unique combination of a magazine publication and private online design group -The Old World Design Society is a place for individuals who cherish the elements of a bygone era. Visit oldworld.parisiennefarmgirl.com Grab the Summer edition NOW!

American Blossom Linens / americanblossomlinens.com / Coupon Code: HOMEMAKERCHIC20 Summer is here.  We are line drying or linens or lounging in bed after a long day of gardening and we are doing both of these things with our American Blossom Linens.  Invest ONCE, enjoy for a lifetime.

JOVIAL FOODS http://www.jovialfoods.com Jovial Foods is the top supplier of einkorn flours, einkorn pasta, Italian olive oils, prepackaged einkorn snacks, and the top-rated gluten-free pasta line.

SHOW SOME LOVE
Homemaker Chic is made possible by our Patrons. If you’d like to show some love to the podcast for just $10 a month and get video forms of all the episodes and much more, you can do that over on Patreon right here. THANK YOU, Patrons – we love you! If you’d like to submit topic requests, you can do that by emailing Shaye and Angela at info@homemakerchicpodcast.com

Mentioned on the show today:

-Shaye's book mention:  Hummelo
https://www.amazon.com/Hummelo-Journey-Through-Plantsmans-Life/dp/1580934188
-Angela's "architectural" underplanting:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/764259942/purple-heart-queen-wandering-jew-3?gpla=1&gao=1&&utm_source=bing&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=shopping_us_all&utm_custom1=_k_161db6492bca1e55919fd6a4bc2f4897_k_&utm_content=bing_319339186_1310617986645934_819136446544

SOCIAL LINKS

Instagram @parisiennefarmgirl
